title: 40 perches Land for Sale
details:
40 Perches for sale in the commercial zone as per UDA zoning,
Facing a 20 foot road with a street line to be a 30 foot road. Just 50 meters from Cotta road.
Ideal for Office, apartments, hotel or other use. There is a 2 unit 10 year old house too on the premises.
Expecting Rs 5.2 Million a perch.
